mapper.insert: insert into tb_item (item_id, item_name, lb, zt, ysj, cbj, hy, spms, bz) values (#{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ysj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cbj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{hy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_item set item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lb = #{lb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zt = #{zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ysj = #{ysj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, cbj = #{cbj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, hy = #{hy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spms = #{spms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select item_id, item_name, lb, zt, ysj, cbj, hy, spms, bz from tb_item
